name: Dilettante
description: What some would call dabbling you call a wide range of interests. Your breadth of knowledge offers unexpected insights in many situations.
prerequisites: 2 ranks each in 5 different Knowledge skills.
benefit: You gain a +2 bonus on Knowledge checks if you have 1â€“5 ranks in that skill. This bonus does not stack with Skill Focus. You can make untrained Knowledge checks with DCs up to 15.
normal: You may only make untrained Knowledge checks for common knowledge (DC 10 or lower).
